column4: hi. OpenOffice is broken. Just keeps crashing every time I try to open the word processor.
hi. OpenOffice is broken. Just keeps crashing every time I try to open the word processor.
what is the error from the console?
hang on

http://www.google.com/#hl=en&source=hp&q=unable+to+get+gail+version+number+terminate+called+after+throwing+an+instance+of+%27com%3A%3Asun%3A%3Astar%3A%3Auno%3A%3ARuntimeException%27&btnG=Google+Search&aq=f&aqi=&oq=&fp=2cca7b2e99206b9c it's the second search
thanks for your help. Most of those links say it's an ubuntu bug.,
I get the warning but my oowriter starts
I'm using 3.0.1 and its fine
did you move your profile like the thread said?
I deleted it. No difference.
what version does synaptic have you using?
try rm -Rf ~/.openoffice.org if you feel you are at that point
already did it. No difference.
find me something relevant from a:    strace oowriter
a whole heap of code appeared. How do I tell what's relevant?
something that says.. "failed, error, can not read, read error, epic fail, etc"
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'com::sun::star::uno::RuntimeException'
are you running as root?
type:   whoami
it gave my user name.
hold on a sec, I gotta do some real work for a big
k thanks
